page.title: 16ARBURY CARNIVAL
page.content: ARBURY CARNIVAL TAKES PLACE EVERY YEAR IN JUNE. THERE ARE MANY FLOATS WHICH ARE DECORATED LORRIES WITH PEOPLE DRESSED UP AS CLOWNS WALKING BESIDE THEM, COLLECTING MONEY FOR CHARITY. THERE ARE A LOT OF STALLS ON THE GREEN WITH DIFFERENT THINGS ON THEM LIKE CAKES, TOYS, BOTTLES, BOOKS, SEAFOOD, LUCKY DIP. IN THE LUCKY DIP, YOU GET ALL DIFFERENT KINDS OF THINGS. OUR SCHOOL HAD 3 KINDS OF STALLS, A CAKE STALL, FATHERS DAY STALL, AND A BOTTLE STALL. THERE IS ALSO A CHEESE STALL. THERE IS A HAMBURGER STALL AND A HOT DOG STALL, AND THERE ARE PEOPLE DANCING IN A SQUARE, OTHERS WEAR FANCY DRESS, THERE IS ALSO A BICYLE COMPETITION.PEOPLE BUY GAS FILLED BALLOONS WHICH ARE RELEASED AND A PRIZE IS AWARDED TO THE PERSON WHOSE BALLOON TRAVELS FARTHEST. THAT IS WHY WE HAVE FUN EVERY YEAR!
